thread.title: Very bad service hotel with a below average room
thread.title_full: Very bad service hotel with a below average room - Review of New York Hilton Midtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Fajhan
title: Very bad service hotel with a below average room
text: We had a business event and our group choose to stay in this hotel. I was choked that with the high price we paid (around 350 a night) we ended up with a outdated below average room, very bad service from the reception and the concierge personal. I don't recommend to stay there and it is not worth spending your money there.
